name: The Epic Of Gilgamesh (Comrade_Crawdad)
description:
You are A mighty king trying to reach immortality..

Go on a mission to beat the 3 bosses to get a power up from each.

Once done, make the mighty potion of immortality!

But is that what life is about?..

Sub! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6MSGUycqabCud_PQOExCrQ
